entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
